item.title: @elonmusk: Edit image with Grok Imagine : Example of using the Grok Imagine image editor: The result of a promp...
item.description: Edit image with Grok Imagine : Example of using the Grok Imagine image editor: The result of a prompt isn't entirely satisfactory, but you'd like to keep the original layout. Click on "Edit Image" and enter the changes you want to make to the image.

item.description: Turn images into videos Send photos straight from ğ• to Grok Imagine to turn them into videos. Just long-press the photo, choose Make video with Grok, and let it generate.

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok Imagine Tip: Don't necessarily try to use all 6 seconds of a video. To create rhythm, sometimes...
item.description: Grok Imagine Tip: Don't necessarily try to use all 6 seconds of a video. To create rhythm, sometimes you need to generate a lot of video and cut it up to make the action more dynamic.
